roleset.name: cause to be empty (of people), empty
roleset.note: EVACUATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'evacuate' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 10.2, Framenet entries Escaping and Removing. (from evacuate.01-v predicate notes)
EVACUATION-N NOTES: Based on sentences in Temprel data. Comparison to evacuate. See VN class banish-10.2 (evacuate). FN class removing. Framed by Katie. (from evacuation.01-n)

example.name: just enclosure
example.text: [The plant]-1 was evacuated [*-1]and workers sent home.

example.name: just people
example.text: [Thousands of residents of low-lying areas]-1 were ordered [*-1]-2 [*-2] to evacuate as the storm headed north in the Gulf of Mexico with 80 mph winds.

example.name: still missing an agent
example.text: Major injuries weren't reported at Candlestick Park, where the third game of baseball's World Series was canceled and fans-4 evacuated [*-4] from the stadium.

example.name: all args
example.text: The police evacuated John and Mary from their rickety love shack.

example.name: arg 1 only
example.text: the evacuation of cities in Katrina's path

example.name: all args
example.text: China's massive evacuation of its citizens from Japan's northeast
